original_title: Tischlein deck dich, Eselein streck dich, Knüppel aus dem Sack
overview: Fairy tale about a taylor with three sons: the fat one, the tall one and the idiot one. The three decide to go on a journey to try their luck.
title: Tischlein deck dich, Eselein streck dich, Knüppel aus dem Sack
